item.title: By: Matt N
item.dc:creator: Matt N
item.description: <p> Simon.<br/>I think they used to call them record players, I seem to recall when I was at school people used to mix to records together & scratch them!!!!<br/>Hope is all well with everyone & that Matt (W) hasnt got too much of a hangover from the 1st of many christmas 'do's'on monday!!!</p>
item.content:encoded:
Simon.
I think they used to call them record players, I seem to recall when I was at school people used to mix to records together & scratch them!!!!
Hope is all well with everyone & that Matt (W) hasnt got too much of a hangover from the 1st of many christmas ‘do’s’on monday!!!

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Spooky - but what on earth is that large piece of equipment which the projector is placed on??!</p>
item.content:encoded: Spooky – but what on earth is that large piece of equipment which the projector is placed on??!

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Great minds do think alike what a fantastic idea, now all we need is affordable Ipods, Matt & I watched a gadget programme last night and it compared the prices in London, New York and Toronto, Canada an ■80 difference in 5 different gadget christmas presies! and as usual they worked around the reason why. Interesting programme though. Just imagine that nice music system SImon has witha built in projector! </p>
item.content:encoded: Great minds do think alike what a fantastic idea, now all we need is affordable Ipods, Matt & I watched a gadget programme last night and it compared the prices in London, New York and Toronto, Canada an ■80 difference in 5 different gadget christmas presies! and as usual they worked around the reason why. Interesting programme though. Just imagine that nice music system SImon has witha built in projector!
